```{r, echo = F}
library("knitr")
opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 8, fig.height = 8, fig.align = "center")
```

```{r setup}
library("tidyverse")
library("phyloseq")
```

```{r read_data}
seqtab <- readRDS("../data/seqtab.rds")
taxa <- readRDS("../data/taxa.rds")
```

```{r histograms}
dim(seqtab)
seq_map <- setNames(
  paste0("species_", seq_along(seqtab)),
  colnames(seqtab)
)

colnames(seqtab) <- seq_map[colnames(seqtab)]
mseqtab <- seqtab %>%
  melt(varnames = c("Number", "species")) %>%
  left_join()

ggplot(mseqtab) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = value))
```
